name: Dragonyhm
storyline: Play as Kris, son of the slayer, embarking on a quest to find him. Along the way, uncover a plot that threatens to destroy the kingdom of Archend!
summary:
Experience an epic tale set in a vivid fantasy world, all on your favourite retro handheld console!

For a number of years after the age-old conflict with dragons came to a head, the people of Archend have enjoyed an era of peace. All was well until the esteemed dragon slayer Kurtis went missing, and the sealed dragons began to awaken.

Play as Kris, son of the slayer, embarking on a quest to find him. Along the way, uncover a plot that threatens to destroy the kingdom of Archend
